title: MUST HEAR Advice - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 229)
description:
Go to http://shopify.com/kfgames to get a free 14-day trial.

Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Nick, Tim, and Joey discuss their current shoe status, give advice for college, cuddle puddles, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Tim “The Mullet” Gettys
00:04:02 - Tim’s Shoe Problem
00:09:26 - Housekeeping
00:10:22 - Getting Lacers to Lace Tim’s Shoes
00:20:35 - College Tips & Horniness Levels
00:34:44 - Ads
00:36:57 - The Work Force and Protected Cuddle Puddles
00:43:06 - Tattoo or $10K Fine?!
00:53:22 - Definitely Not a Segment About Pranking Greg

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
